title: Paradox

fields.name: Powers:
fields.value:
- Roleblock a player.
- Transport two players.
Passives:
- You may multitask.
- You may not transport yourself.
- While you are alive, no roles have any immunities except standard defense.
- This role cannot spawn unless at least two other roles with roleblock or redirect capabilities spawn.
- If a paradox would occur that cannot be resolved due to a lack of immunities (e.g. someone roleblocking themselves), the ability fails and any party involved except for you dies.
- Priority being able to resolve a paradox does not resolve the paradox.
